properties.name: project.cassandra.keyspace.replication-factor
properties.description: Replication factor for a partition in Cassandra.

properties.name: project.cassandra.keyspace.durable-writes
properties.description: Durable writes true/false. Whether Cassandra should write to commit log for each write in order not to loose data if the memtable was lost due to outage.

properties.name: project.cassandra.seeds
properties.description: Initial cassandra seed nodes through which we can discover cluster's topology.
